title: Designing Collaborative Language Learning Through Online Peer Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theory and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Learners are Office/Administrative Professionals Aiming to Enhance Language Education Design Skills Through Peer Assessment and Collaborative Learning in VR Environments

learning_goals: Learners can improve language education simulation scenarios by 80% or more by reflecting on peer assessment feedback.
Learners can maintain positive interactions at a frequency of 90% or higher in online collaborative learning environments.
Learners can perform three or more instances of high-quality cognitive engagement (analytical feedback, concrete suggestions) during peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
